resources.string: Translate in real time in over \n100+ languages
Simply speak into your phone\nto translate your words into\nany desired language
Click a picture of the text to\ntranslate into your desired\nlanguage

1. Record your voice

2. Choose language

3. Click on translate button

1. Enter the text

2. Choose language

3. Click on translate button
we need permission for read-write storage and your camera
we need permission for record your voice
